mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{emp_num} ORDER BY go_work DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE(ATT_NUM, EMP_NUM, ATT_STATUS, GO_WORK) SELECT ATTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_num}, #{att_status}, SYSDATE FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{emp_num} AND TRUNC(GO_WORK) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) )
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATT_STATUS = #{att_status}, LEAVE_WORK = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{emp_num} AND TRUNC(GO_WORK) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ATT_STATUS = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT a.GO_WORK, a.leave_work FROM ATTENDANCE a INNER JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num INNER JOIN request_history rh ON a.att_num = rh.request_num WHERE e.EMP_NUM = #{emp_num} AND rh.state != 0
